Description:
Detects PowerShell scripts attempting to disable scheduled scanning and other parts of Windows Defender ATP or set default actions to allow.

Author: frack113, elhoim, Tim Shelton (fps, alias support), Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Tamper Windows Defender - ScriptBlockLogging
Query: sourcetype="windows-*" ((scriptblocktext="*-dbaf $true*" OR scriptblocktext="*-dbaf 1*" OR scriptblocktext="*-dbm $true*" OR scriptblocktext="*-dbm 1*" OR scriptblocktext="*-dips $true*" OR scriptblocktext="*-dips 1*" OR scriptblocktext="*-DisableArchiveScanning $true*" OR scriptblocktext="*-DisableArchiveScanning 1*" OR scriptblocktext="*-DisableBehaviorMonitoring $true*" OR scriptblocktext="*-DisableBehaviorMonitoring 1*" OR scriptblocktext="*-DisableBlockAtFirstSeen $true*" OR scriptblocktext="*-DisableBlockAtFirstSeen 1*" OR scriptblocktext="*-DisableCatchupFullScan $true*" OR scriptblocktext="*-DisableCatchupFullScan 1*" OR scriptblocktext="*-DisableCatchupQuickScan $true*" OR scriptblocktext="*-DisableCatchupQuickScan 1*" OR scriptblocktext="*-DisableIntrusionPreventionSystem $true*" OR scriptblocktext="*-DisableIntrusionPreventionSystem 1*" OR scriptblocktext="*-DisableIOAVProtection $true*" OR scriptblocktext="*-DisableIOAVProtection 1*" OR scriptblocktext="*-DisableRealtimeMonitoring $true*" OR scriptblocktext="*-DisableRealtimeMonitoring 1*" OR scriptblocktext="*-DisableRemovableDriveScanning $true*" OR scriptblocktext="*-DisableRemovableDriveScanning 1*" OR scriptblocktext="*-DisableScanningMappedNetworkDrivesForFullScan $true*" OR scriptblocktext="*-DisableScanningMappedNetworkDrivesForFullScan 1*" OR scriptblocktext="*-DisableScanningNetworkFiles $true*" OR scriptblocktext="*-DisableScanningNetworkFiles 1*" OR scriptblocktext="*-DisableScriptScanning $true*" OR scriptblocktext="*-DisableScriptScanning 1*" OR scriptblocktext="*-MAPSReporting $false*" OR scriptblocktext="*-MAPSReporting 0*" OR scriptblocktext="*-drdsc $true*" OR scriptblocktext="*-drdsc 1*" OR scriptblocktext="*-drtm $true*" OR scriptblocktext="*-drtm 1*" OR scriptblocktext="*-dscrptsc $true*" OR scriptblocktext="*-dscrptsc 1*" OR scriptblocktext="*-dsmndf $true*" OR scriptblocktext="*-dsmndf 1*" OR scriptblocktext="*-dsnf $true*" OR scriptblocktext="*-dsnf 1*" OR scriptblocktext="*-dss $true*" OR scriptblocktext="*-dss 1*") scriptblocktext="*Set-MpPreference*") OR (scriptblocktext="*Set-MpPreference*" (scriptblocktext="*HighThreatDefaultAction Allow*" OR scriptblocktext="*htdefac Allow*" OR scriptblocktext="*LowThreatDefaultAction Allow*" OR scriptblocktext="*ltdefac Allow*" OR scriptblocktext="*ModerateThreatDefaultAction Allow*" OR scriptblocktext="*mtdefac Allow*" OR
